Traits.Name: Fortify
Traits.Description: At the end of their turn, they gain Vigilance 1.

Traits.Name: Legion
Traits.Description: Up to two foes with Legion can take their turns at the same time.
Traits.DescriptionNonessential: A foe with this trait has reduced stats but costs half the encounter points.

Traits.Name: Rise Again
Traits.Description: This character has a chance to rise again when defeated. Roll 1d6 at the start of each round. On a 4+, this character gets back up at 25% hp. If all characters with this trait are defeated, it deactivates.

Actions.Name: Soul Slash
Actions.Effect: All foes adjacent to the target take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Death March
Actions.Description: The Wight and all adjacent allies may move 1 space in the same direction, ignoring engagement, then each may deal [fray] damage to an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Formation
Actions.Description: Shove all allies in range 2 1 space towards this character.
